title: Idea to boost esports views: critical view!

replies.body:
They would never do the "Watch esports to get more Crit/dmg" because that would essentially be pay to win. But instead of paying with Currency you are paying with time. Also people would just let them run in the back ground and their viewership numbers would just be inflated. people would be placing the videos in the background and not watching them just to get the bonus. 

What they could do is create a icon, emote, or a border of some kind from your "Critical View"  or credit.

_pinches bridge of nose_

Critical VIEW. They could sell the equivalent of passes but call them items for branding purposes, and the "item" (notice the quotes, like I used in the OP) would increase your chance to get a special reward from viewing an esport match. It has literally nothing to do with in game performance. Please read more carefully before commenting next time; thanks.
